RORSettlementTemplate.MenuHeaderText: {=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_deathjacks}The town is home to the Deathjacks, an infamous and deadly archer regiment of renown.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_stir_scout}Within the town you find a barrack of the Stir River Patrol, it has seen constant use and houses weary patrolmen.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_blazing_sun}Within the town there is a Chapter House of the Knights of the Blazing Sun.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_kragsburg}The town is home to the Von Kragsburg Guard. Their barracks are ornate, ordered and clean.

{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_engineer}Within the town, you may find the Imperial Gunnery School. It is a sprawling network of forges, smelteries and factories, worked by the Empires Veteran Gunsmiths and Engineers.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_grundel}The town houses the quarters of Grundel's Defenders. A temporary resting place, spears are lined up against the walls.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_blooddragon}Within the town there is a Chapter House of the Blood Dragons.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_sternieste}Near the village, the Forgotten Legion of Castle Sternieste awaits in their crypt, ready to be raised.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_konigstein}Under the town in an ancient crypt, the Konigstein Stalkers await their new master.

{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_longshank}The village houses a Longshanks Encampment. Despite their life of constant travel, vowing to never stay anywhere for long, camps like this can still be found when these hardy folk rest their weary legs.

{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_taal}The village houses a Horned Hunter Encampment. Despite deep forays into the woods of Talabecland, travelling far from civilisation to honour Taal, Hunters are seen to pass through this camp to rest.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_altdorf}Home to the renowned and loved Altdorf Company of Honour, the 'Sons of the Reik', only the best may fight alongside these venerable warriors.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_griffon}Within the great Cathedral of Sigmar, resides the barracks of the Knights Griffon. The deadliest knights within the Empire.

{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_reiksguard}Due to Grünburg's proximity to Castle Reikguard, the headquarters of the Grand Order of the Reiksguard Knights, some of the finest knights of the Empire often patrol these roads.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_hochland_scout}Hergig is home to the Hergig Jaegerkorps. These elite marksman are ever training their precise aim. They can be found in the Hergig korps hunting lodge.

{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_ostland_shield}The devoted of Morr are sparring in the chapels courtyard honing their greatsword skills. Blessed by the priest of Morr and with two silver coins in their pocket, they are ready for battle.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_drakwald_patrol}The village is home to a Drakwald patrol outpost, The Gunderman's Surefires are ready to set out.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_marienburg_sailor}Inside the port of Marienburg, The Van Klumpf Buccaneers are to be found on their ship, Ready to set sail.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_nordland_mariner}The town is a home to the famous Nordland Seahawks, ready to board any Norscan longship.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_bergerac}Around Bergerac, you notice the camp of the famous Bowman of Bergerac.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_maisontaal}Inside the Abby of Maisontaal you find the Taal devoted cultists of maisontaal.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_peasant_squire}The village is home to Geg's Manor. Little more than a shack, it is nevertheless home to the less than regal Peasant Knights of Wainfleet.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_anguille_sailor}Inside the warf's barracks resides the brave Corduin's knightly mariners, they are ready to sail out for their next job.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_wolfkin}Inside Middenheim the cult of Ulric reigns. At the temple of Ulric, The most devoted of Ulric's followers stand ready, thirsting for battle.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_kharmourt}In Castle Carcasonne's barracks the Kharmourt's Blades can be found, the personal pride of Baron Larieu of Kharmourt.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_bastonne_squire}Within the Court of Bastonne you may find the Beastslayers of Bastonne, much like their fearsome liege lord, they excel at fighting dangerous monsters.
{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_mounted_bowman}In the castle stable's the Wardens tend their horses and ready their bows, the infamous Wardens of Montfort are ready to protect their country.

{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_lionhearted}From Castle Lyonesse home to the first great companion, Thierulf the Lionhearted, come the most ferocious of Bretonnia’s Knights. They can be found in the Chapel of the Lady.

{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_wildwood_ranger}Not all Forest Spirits wish to coexist with the Asrai. Malevolent and deranged denizens of the forest are banished to the Wildwood, where elite Willdwood Rangers keep their eternal watch.

{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_loec}Fyr Darric, the Trickster's Wood, holds the largest concentration of Wardancer troupes wandering through Athel Loren. Music and laughter can often be heard in this region, but not all things are as they seem at a glance.

{=str_tor_ror_settlement_text_wild_rider}Here, in King's Glade, impulsive Wild Riders, without uttering a word, await the rebirth of their master, Orion. Their only desire is to ride the Wild Hunt at the side of the King in the Woods.
